pkgmetadata.longdescription: Matched tumor-normal SNP microarray example data for the PSCBS package // This package contains data that accompany the PSCBS package implementing the Paired Parent-Specific Circular Binary Segmentation (Paired PSCBS) method. The data are on from a matched tumor-normal pair obtained using SNP microarrays. To save space, only data from one chromosome is included.
